title.rendered: Kucoin Review, How To Create Kucoin Account

content.rendered:
Kucoin Review, KuCoin exchange is one of the top digital asset trading platforms in the world. Furthermore, the crypto exchange flaunts of serving one out of every four crypto holders internationally. Since its establishment, the exchange has expanded its services, hosting over 300 employees in 207 countries.

Table of Contents

  • What is KuCoin?
  • KuCoin Exchange Details
  • Key Features & Advantages of KuCoin
  • KuCoin Review
    • Pros:
    • Cons:
  • How To Create KuCoin Account
  • How to Open a KuCoin Account

What is KuCoin?

Kucoin Review, KuCoin is a Seychelles-based exchange that was originally launched in Hong Kong in 2017, marketing themselves as ‘The People’s Exchange’. Their aim was to give people all over the world access to a simple and safe platform to buy and sell a range of digital currencies. They have certainly made an impact in the global crypto community, growing its user base to over 11 million in just 5 years, and serving one in four crypto holders worldwide.

 

Kucoin Review – How To Create Kucoin Account

KuCoin Exchange Details

Key Features & Advantages of KuCoin

KuCoin has become one of the biggest cryptocurrency exchanges in the world, and that is largely due to the wide range of features and services they offer. KuCoin has plenty of advantages that set it apart from the other exchanges, let’s look at some of the best features below:

  • Extremely low trade fees of 0.1%, with discounts if you pay with KCS

  • Over 600+ different cryptocurrencies available 

  • Mobile app for iOS and Android 

  • Buy crypto directly with fiat currencies

  • Only partial KYC verification required

  • P2P marketplace – buy & sell crypto with ZERO fees

  • Futures and margin trading

  • KuCoin bonus – earn KCS coins daily

  • Crypto lending and borrowing

  • KuCoin trading bot

  • Bank-level asset security

KuCoin Review

Pros:

  • Large crypto exchange with over 11 million users worldwide
  • Extremely low fees of 0.1% with a further 20% discount if you pay with KCS
  • Mobile app available for iOS and Android
  • Over 600+ cryptocurrencies available
  • Additional features such as crypto lending, trading bots, margin trading, futures trading

Cons:

  • High fees when buying crypto with fiat (3%-12%)
  • Cannot withdraw fiat currencies
  • Poor customer service – no live chat support

How To Create KuCoin Account

How to Open a KuCoin Account

Enter kucoin.com, you should see a page similar to below. Click on the “Sign Up” button in the upper right corner. We support users to register an account with a mobile phone or email address.

1. Sign up with an email address

Input your E-mail address and click “Send Code” button. Wait for the email verification code to be sent to your mailbox and enter the verification code you received. Then set the login password, read through and agree to the “Terms of Use”, click “Sign Up” button to complete your registration.

2. Sign up with the phone number

Select the country code, input your phone number, and click “Send Code” button. Wait for the SMS verification code to be sent to your phone and enter the verification code you received. Set your login password, read through and agree to the “Terms of Use”, then click “Sign Up” to complete your registration.

Tips:
1. If your email address or phone number has been bound for one account at KuCoin, it cannot be registered multiply.

2. Users from Phone Registration Supported Country List can register an account by the mobile phone. If your country is not on the supported list, please register an account by your email address.

3. If you are invited to register a KuCoin account, please check whether the referral code is filled in on the password setting interface or not. If not, the referral link might be expired. Please input the referral code manually to ensure the referral relationship is successfully established.

Congratulations that you have completed the registration and are able to use KuCoin now.
